analyze_delegate_notes.title: The Smoking Gun
analyze_delegate_notes.description: The scattered papers reveal a horrifying pattern: coded messages coordinating simultaneous attacks on all major infrastructure. The harmonic disruptions in the Singing Depths, the transport sabotage, the trade manipulation - it's all connected. One name appears repeatedly in the communications: 'The Architect.' And worse - there's a timeline. The final phase of their plan launches in just days.

choices.text: 'I need to take this evidence to every crisis team immediately.'
'Who is this Architect? We need to find them.'
‚è∞ 'We're running out of time - what's the final phase?'
'We need to stop their other operations before they connect.'
